name: The Cost of a Modest Retirement in the US
description:
Minimum monthly savings contributions required to meet the goal of $1.5M. The amount that would be necessary for the artist to retire at age 67.

Figure based on the calculator at:

https://www.merrilledge.com/retirement/personal-retirement-calculator 

Calculations assume a poor market, average life expectancy for a US male (80), 3% inflation, $65,000 annual salary, 2% annual salary growth, and a moderate investment strategy. The price takes into consideration platform fees, crypto to fiat conversion rate and associated fees, transfer fees and taxes.

Edition size calculated based on the number of months remaining in the artist's life assuming the average life expectancy of a male US citizen.
